data.title: Crayon Shin-chan Specials
data.meta_description: Looking for episode specific information on Crayon Shin-chan Specials? Then you should check out MyAnimeList! 87 Crayon Shin-chan TV Specials exist as of August 6, 2022.
data.text:
1 Following the Rules / Mochi Pounding in Kindergarten / It's warm in Kotatsu / The Adventures of Buriburizaemon / Year-End Cleaning / Shopping on New Year's Eve / Action Mask Special / Memories of the Year

Oyakusoku ga Ippai da zo / Youchien de Omochitsuki da zo / Kotatsu wa Attakai zo / Buriburizaemon no Bouken da zo / Oosouji wa Oosoudou da zo / Oshougatsu no Kaidashi ni Iku zo / Action Kamen Special da zo / Kotoshi no Omoide da zo (お約束がいっぱいだゾ / 幼稚園でおもちつきだゾ /コタツはあったかいゾ / ブリブリざえもんのボーケンだゾ / 大ソージは大騒動だゾ / お正月の買い出しに行くゾ / アクション仮面スペシャルだゾ / 今年の思い出だゾ) Dec 28, 1992 2 / / / TheFinal Episode of Action Mask / A Trip with My Mom
